front.title: Update of legacy IANA Registrations of Enumservices

abstract.t: This document specifies a revision of all Enumservices that have been registered at IANA under the nowadays obsolete regime of [RFC3761]. It mainly adds the new fields to the IANA Registration Template as specified in [I-D.ietf-enum-enumservices-guide], and makes at the same time some corrections of editorial nature.
